text.section:
As part of the application for a State criminal history records check to be conducted by the Department, an eligible employee shall submit to the adult dependent care program:
Except as provided in subsection (c) of this section, a complete set of legible fingerprints taken on forms specified by the Director of the Criminal Justice Information System Central Repository; and
The disclosure statement required under § 19-1905 of this subtitle.
The adult dependent care program shall submit the fingerprints, disclosure statement, and payment for the costs of the criminal history records check.
